content.html: Happy 2022 friends! 12 years ago I began posting notes on my site before Twitter: tantek.com/2010/001/t1/de… Have a site? Own your notes in 2022. Be the #P2P #decentralization you want to see, instead of tweeting to the wind. Questions? Ask #indieweb ... tantek.com/t5GZ1
content.value:
Happy 2022 friends!

12 years ago I began posting notes on my site before Twitter: tantek.com/2010/001/t1/de…

Have a site? Own your notes in 2022.

Be the #P2P #decentralization you want to see, instead of tweeting to the wind.

Questions? Ask #indieweb ...tantek.com/t5GZ1
